Description: Painted(faded) wooden shabti of Nbt pr B3k-mḥyt with a blue striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced features, a red collar and crossed arms in relief holding two red hoes and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in twelve rows of incised blue Hieroglyphs.
